game.name: Moss
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Tracked Controller Support, VR Only, SteamVR Collectibles, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Moss is an action-adventure puzzle game from Polyarc tailor-made for the VR platform. It combines classic components of a great game—compelling characters, gripping combat, and captivating world exploration—with the exciting opportunities of VR.
